alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued December 19 at 3:46AM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Extremely cold conditions will persist for nearly 36 hours. Snow and blowing snow is also possible Wednesday night and given the extremely low wind chills travel will be very hazardous.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
